desc.p: Specifies total amount of debit entries for the Booking Date specified in the corresponding DAY.NO.
Standard amount format.
Multivalue field associated with field range DAY.NO to BALANCE.
This is a NOINPUT field.

The opening balance for the account for the month specified in the id of the record is held in this field. This opening balance is based on the Booking Date/Accounting Date of the entries in the Account.

In case of entries with an Accounting Date, the balances would be updated only when the Post Closing (PC) Database are updated and the movement would be reported against the date of the earliest PC Database updated.
Standard T24 amount field. System generated - this is a NOINPUT field.
Specifies total amount of credit entries for the Booking Date specified in the corresponding DAY.NO.
Standard amount format.
Multivalue field associated with field range DAY.NO to BALANCE.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Specifies Balance for the Booking Date specified in the corresponding DAY.NO.
Standard amount format.
Multivalue field associated with field range DAY.NO to BALANCE.
This is a NO INPUT field.

The closing balance for the account for the month specified in the id of the record is held in this field. This closing balance is based on the Booking Date/Accounting Date of the entries in the Account.

In case of entries with an Accounting Date, the balances would be updated only when the Post Closing (PC) Database are updated and the movement would be reported against the date of the earliest PC Database updated.
Standard T24 amount field. System generated - this is a NOINPUT field.
Specifies the booking date of the entries which generated the credit and debit turnover and resulting balance in the corresponding field range TOTAL.CREDITS to BALANCE.

The multivalue associated group of field range DAY.NO to BALANCE contain the total amount of credit entries, the total amount of debit entries and the resulting Balance for each Booking Date for which there have been entries. The group is repeated for each different Booking Date.

Entries with an ACCOUNTING.DATE and updated to Post Closing (PC) Database would be reported against the date of the earliest Post Closing (PC) Database updated (i.e. earliest PC.PERIOD.END in the entries, provided the field PC.APPLIED=Y).
2 numeric characters. This is a NOINPUT field.
